#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--){
		long long ans ;
		cin>>ans;
		int a,b,c,d;
		cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
		int x,y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		int m;
		m = ceil(log2 (max(x,y)));
		
		x = x-1;
		y = y-1;
		for(int  i=m-1;i>=0;i--){
			if(((x&(1<<i))==0)&&((y&(1<<i))==0)){
				ans *= a;
			}
			else if(((x&(1<<i))==0)&&((y&(1<<i))!=0)){
				ans *= b;
			}
			
			else if(((x&(1<<i))!=0)&&((y&(1<<i))==0)){
				ans *= c;
			}
			
			else if(((x&(1<<i))!=0)&&((y&(1<<i))!=0)){
				ans *= d;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
